parameters.content:
## Daily Aim & Stoic Accountability System

This workflow helps you stay accountable to your daily goal with stoic-inspired reminders.

**How it works:**
1. Every morning at 7 AM, you receive a Telegram message asking for your ONE main task
2. Every 2 hours (8 AM - 10 PM), you get reminded with a stoic quote
3. Reply ‚úÖ when done, or ‚è≥ to continue working
4. End-of-day reflection at 10:30 PM

**Setup Required:**
- Configure Telegram Bot credentials
- Set your Telegram Chat ID in all Telegram nodes
- Configure OpenAI credentials for quote generation

## Morning Task Prompt

Triggered daily at 7:00 AM IST.
Sends a Telegram message asking for today's main task.

**Credential Setup:**
- Add your Telegram Bot API credentials
- Replace CHAT_ID with your Telegram chat ID

## 2-Hour Reminder Loop

Runs every 2 hours from 8 AM to 10 PM.
Checks task status and sends reminder with stoic quote if pending.

**Active Hours:** 8:00, 10:00, 12:00, 14:00, 16:00, 18:00, 20:00, 22:00

## User Response Handler

Processes user replies from Telegram:
- ‚úÖ Completed ‚Üí Marks task done, sends acknowledgment
- ‚è≥ Still Working ‚Üí Keeps status pending
- New task input ‚Üí Stores as daily task

**Credential Setup:**
- Configure Telegram Bot Trigger with your bot token

## End of Day Check

Triggered at 10:30 PM IST.
If task is still pending, sends a calm stoic reflection.
Resets the system for the next day.

## AI Quote Generation

Uses OpenAI to generate short, stoic motivational quotes.
Themes: Discipline, Consistency, Time, Self-control, Duty.

**Credential Setup:**
- Add your OpenAI API credentials

parameters.text: üåÖ Good morning! Shaurya | What is your ONE main aim/task for today?Reply with your task to set your focus for the day.

Generate a short, powerful stoic motivational quote about one of these themes: discipline, consistency, time management, self-control, or duty. The quote should be 1-2 sentences maximum, direct and action-oriented. Do not use emojis. Just output the quote, nothing else.

üìã Task Reminder

Have you completed your task:
"{{ $json.dailyTask }}"

Reply:
‚úÖ Completed
‚è≥ Still Working

‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
{{ $json.stoicQuote }}

‚úÖ Task Completed!

"{{ $json.dailyTask }}"

You did what you set out to do. This is how discipline is built ‚Äî one completed task at a time.

Rest well. Tomorrow brings new challenges.

‚è≥ Acknowledged.

Your task: "{{ $json.dailyTask }}"

Stay focused. Progress is made through persistence, not perfection.

üìù Task Set!

Your focus for today:
"{{ $json.dailyTask }}"

I'll check in with you every 2 hours. Reply ‚úÖ when completed or ‚è≥ if still working.

üìù Task Updated!

Your new focus:
"{{ $json.dailyTask }}"

Stay committed. One task, full attention.

üåô End of Day

Your task "{{ $json.dailyTask }}" remains incomplete.

This is not failure ‚Äî it is information. Reflect on what prevented completion. Was the task too large? Did distractions win? Were priorities misaligned?

Tomorrow is a new opportunity. The obstacle is the way.

Rest now. Wake ready.

üåô Day Complete

You accomplished your task today. Well done.

Consistency compounds. Sleep well.
